short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clear your browser cache before loading a page. Can be enabled/disabled with a single mouse click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Please be aware that the extension reverts to the "off" state whenever the browser restarts. To prevent this, use the "Enable on start" option in the extension settings (right click on extension button, then "Options").
